jobDescription: Worked as a Front-end Developer at Astrogem24 where my key responsibility was to collaborating with a team of seven members across the globe & building a production ready e-commerce web application with MERN stack. I have also built reusable React components in the development & managed other team members tasks through GitHub and Google Meet.

Worked as a React Developer at SNL International where my key responsibility was to building a web application for the company with an eye soothing user interface while caring about the demand of the client. I have also built reusable React components and tried to write well-documented codes.

Working as a Front-End Developer at Pioneer Alpha where my responsibility is to collaborating with the front-end, back-end & the UI/UX team and developing state of the art web applications using Next.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS etc. This is a remote opportunity where I work am assigned tasks from the team lead through Asana and I also report the team lead through Asana once the assigned task is finished.
